title: Integrated Education in Behavioral, Social, and Humanities Sciences for Medical Leadership

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Healthcare Systems and Organizational Management
context.additional_context: For healthcare administrators/leaders. Blended learning combining online instruction with digital tools and on-site workshops. Emphasizes comprehensive decision-making competencies

learning_goals: They can apply a systems thinking model to analyze the interaction of personal and social factors in healthcare environments
They can develop reflective practice strategies that incorporate sociocultural contexts within patient care settings
They can integrate theories from behavioral science, social science, and humanities to solve complex medical problems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
